alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 11 at 6:12AM EDT until September 12 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Around the times of high tide, from late morning through mid-afternoon. For Upper Keys there will be very little relief at low tide. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is possible. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels have peaked, but improvements will take a couple of days.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
